attributes.action: put pressure on the Chinese Governent to stop the cruelty and starvation of tigers and other animals at Xiongshen Tiger and Bear Mountain Village in Guilin, China
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This barbaric park breeds then starves thousands of tigers each year to use the bones to make "Tiger Wine".  1500 tigers are kept in appauling conditions, near starvation and we the undersigned believe that something must be done to stop this.  Tigers are an endangered species and half of the Siberian tigers are locked in this hell hole waiting to die to have their body parts and skeletons sold and used in medicines and "Tiger Wine". China has signed international treaties banning the sale of tiger animal parts, we must make sure that they stick to their word.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
